Plugin onewire - developer information¶

How to add a new component support?¶

Todo

all following points * add options, * create class, * call class with options if correct option enabled * update description xml file for options * update stats xml file * xpl-stat/xpl-trig * rules to choose xpl schema

xpl-stat or xpl-trig¶

When a value is read and sent by 1 wire plugin, here is the rule which must be followed:

IF  DIFFERENT FROM
THEN use xpl-trig
ELSE use xpl-stat

DS18B20, DS18S20, DS2438¶

xPL messages¶

When temperature changes for a DS18B20 (or DS18S20) component:

xpl-stat
{
...
}
sensor.basic
{
device=
current=
type=temp
}

When temperature doesn’t change:

xpl-trig
{
...
}
sensor.basic
{
device=
current=
type=temp
}

For DS2438, for the humidity the same messages will be used with type=humidity
